section.p: The Vital Signs section contains measured vital signs at the time of the examination. Measurements may include some or all of the following: blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, body temperature, and pulse oximetry. Comments on relative trends may be appropriate, but not required. This section can be a first-level section or nested under Physical Exam.
